Text: RE EPGT Cc Daren what about February It doesnt look like its been pathed for HPL and CHAN Please let me know Thanks Gloria Original Message From Farmer Daren J Sent Monday June PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject RE EPGT Deal has been pathed from the Texas side D Original Message From Barkowsky Gloria G Sent Friday June PM To Garcia Clarissa Farmer Daren J Dinari Sabra L Subject EPGT Clarissa Thanks so much for all your help with this pipe Everything looks great I just have a couple of paths that I need to finish it January I need deal pathed for EPGT and for TETC According to the invoice we should have dth on the interconnect February I need deal pathed for HPL and CHAN HPL should have dth and CHAN should have dth on the interconnect July Deal has an interconnect issue According to MOPS contract they received dth on the Matagorda but according to EPGT they delivered dth to HPL Could this possibly need to be split somehow or do you have any other ideas Let me know Thanks Gloria

EPGTpst Clarissa Thanks so much for all your help with this pipe Everything looks great I just have a couple of paths that I need to finish it January I need deal pathed for EPGT and for TETC According to the invoice we should have dth on the interconnect February I need deal pathed for HPL and CHAN HPL should have dth and CHAN should have dth on the interconnect July Deal has an interconnect issue According to MOPS contract they received dth on the Matagorda but according to EPGT they delivered dth to HPL Could this possibly need to be split somehow or do you have any other ideas Let me know Thanks Gloria

FW EPGT Cc Daren can you please let me know the status on this for Thanks Gloria Original Message From Barkowsky Gloria G Sent Friday June PM To Farmer Daren J Cc Garcia Clarissa Subject RE EPGT Daren what about February It doesnt look like its been pathed for HPL and CHAN Please let me know Thanks Gloria Original Message From Farmer Daren J Sent Monday June PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject RE EPGT Deal has been pathed from the Texas side D Original Message From Barkowsky Gloria G Sent Friday June PM To Garcia Clarissa Farmer Daren J Dinari Sabra L Subject EPGT Clarissa Thanks so much for all your help with this pipe Everything looks great I just have a couple of paths that I need to finish it January I need deal pathed for EPGT and for TETC According to the invoice we should have dth on the interconnect February I need deal pathed for HPL and CHAN HPL should have dth and CHAN should have dth on the interconnect July Deal has an interconnect issue According to MOPS contract they received dth on the Matagorda but according to EPGT they delivered dth to HPL Could this possibly need to be split somehow or do you have any other ideas Let me know Thanks Gloria

FW Agency Deals Cc Original Message From Barkowsky Gloria G Sent Monday August PM To Ruscitti Kevin Cc Ogunbunmi Hakeem Subject Agency Deals Hakeem and I would like to meet with you all to go over the various Agency deals and what is lacking in Sitara to capture these deals correctly We would like to meet with you on Wednesday August at C from to Please let me know if you will be able to attend Thanks Gloria

Agency Deals Cc Hakeem and I would like to meet with you all to go over the various Agency deals and what is lacking in Sitara to capture these deals correctly We would like to meet with you on Wednesday August at C from to Please let me know if you will be able to attend Thanks Gloria

HoustonHere are the things that we need to work on while you are here Powder River external pool FUGG Imbalance PSCO imbalance swap Please take a look at deal for There is an interconnect for on the sale for FUGG but there is nothing on the supply for FUGG Should this really be an interconnect deal Same thing on deal for There is an interconnect for on the sale for FUGG but there is no supply and the deal is set up at the imbalance point Should this really be an interconnect deal Crestone draft for for contract deal The rate has been changed from to Is this correct The draft is for over Crestone draft for for contract deal for dth for
PSCOI received the invoice Did you send it to me Or do they send both of us a copy Anyway I was just wondering if you needed it Let me know Thanks Gloria

RE LC sept revisedThanks for sending this But what is this UA The cumulative imbalance in Unify is and this report is showing Difference is UA Original Message From Felling Amy Sent Tuesday October AM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject LC sept revised Sorry I didnt get this to you before Amy Felling

FUGGHave you adjusted the for FUGG yet I was just wondering what kind of time frame you are looking at We have an interconnect between WIC and FUGG for for Also what about the unify imbalance problem with FUGG that we discussed while you were here If there is anything I can do to help please let me know I was wondering if it would help you if I actualized the current months if that would allow you to have time to work on the past problems Let me know Thanks Gloria

RE CIG invoicesI just finished faxing everything Give it some time Your fax was busy for a while But let me know which ones you dont get Thanks Gloria Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Wednesday November PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject CIG invoices Gloria Is there any way you could copy and send overnight to me the CIG invoices for the contract from May through January I am helping Darla and Megan reconcile the Citizens account It is changing over to Kinder Morgan effective Dec and we need to reconcile this account rather quickly I printed all other invoices on the Internet from CIGs website but they only go back months Let me know if this is possible or where else I might find these Thanks Theresa

FW lost creekTheresa has this been corrected Please let me know Thanks Gloria Original Message From Barkowsky Gloria G Sent Wednesday December PM To Staab Theresa Subject lost creek Did you get my phone message about lost creek Please call me Thanks Gloria

Crestone ImbalanceTheresa heres the latest by month of the imbalance Please let me know if there is any way that I can help you Could I look at current month while you look at the past stuff Please let me know Thanks Gloria

RE Lost Creek Sept On contract LCIT there is an additional receipt and delivery on for dth For the imbalance to be correct we have to have dth delivered but neither WIC or CIG is showing this and its causing an interconnect Can you please let me know where this needs to be delivered to Also have you heard anything from PSCO Thanks Gloria Original Message From Felling Amy Sent Monday October PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Fore Jeanne Subject Lost Creek Sept Please call if you have any questions Jeanne The fuel purchase should be correct Gloria We are waiting for the to bridge over Thanks Amy Felling

RE Crestone Imbalance Cc There is an interconnect between WIC and FUGG for The WIC ties to the statement Can you please check the FUGG Right now I have some extra time I would love to help you guys with this imbalance Could I take a look at Please let me know Thanks Gloria Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Wednesday October PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject RE Crestone Imbalance Gloria Amy Felling here is working on current month and Ill continue on prior month variances Well let you know the status of current month by tomorrow afternoon Thanks Theresa Original Message From Barkowsky Gloria G Sent Wednesday October AM To Staab Theresa Subject Crestone Imbalance File Crestonexls Theresa heres the latest by month of the imbalance Please let me know if there is any way that I can help you Could I look at current month while you look at the past stuff Please let me know Thanks Gloria

RE Crestone ImbalanceThat sounds great Can you fax the invoices to me at Thanks Gloria Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Tuesday November PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject RE Crestone Imbalance Gloria Thanks for the heads up on Im printing the report right now and Ill get with Amy tomorrow shes out today If you would like to look at August that would be fine I would just like to stress that changing any receipts will affect our purchases and likewise with our deliveries If you could define the differences first then maybe I can lead you to where the issues are How does that sound I also think by doing this it will get you familiar with this pipeline and maybe in the future you could take this part over Its just very confusing at first Let me know Theresa Original Message From Barkowsky Gloria G Sent Tuesday November PM To Staab Theresa Felling Amy Cc Schumack Sherlyn Subject RE Crestone Imbalance There is an interconnect between WIC and FUGG for The WIC ties to the statement Can you please check the FUGG Right now I have some extra time I would love to help you guys with this imbalance Could I take a look at Please let me know Thanks Gloria Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Wednesday October PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject RE Crestone Imbalance Gloria Amy Felling here is working on current month and Ill continue on prior month variances Well let you know the status of current month by tomorrow afternoon Thanks Theresa Original Message From Barkowsky Gloria G Sent Wednesday October AM To Staab Theresa Subject Crestone Imbalance File Crestonexls Theresa heres the latest by month of the imbalance Please let me know if there is any way that I can help you Could I look at current month while you look at the past stuff Please let me know Thanks Gloria

RE Crestone ImbalanceI adjusted for the rounding and then deliveries were off by on the th and on the th So I made that adjustment to ENA on contract Now the ENA volumes tie to the WIC contract so no interconnect problem now Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Wednesday November PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject RE Crestone Imbalance What did you need to do to finish We have about cleared the RE Final Statements and Invoices for Novemberyes Ill do this Do you have anything for Crestone and Lost Creek Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Thursday December PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Cc Whitt Mark Subject FW Final Statements and Invoices for November Gloria Here is a final invoice from MPC Will you handle this Please call if you have any questions Thanks Theresa Original Message From Whitt Mark Sent Thursday December PM To Staab Theresa Subject FW Final Statements and Invoices for November Whos hsould we send this to Original Message From McDonald Connie A mailto Sent Wednesday December PM To Whitt Mark Ogunbunmi Hakeem Adams Jacqueline P Mendel Shelly Subject Final Statements and Invoices for November ENRONxls zexe
CIG Theresa CIG just finaled their invoices today and I am working on them I will take a look at this and get back with you Thanks Gloria

RE CIG Yes the invoice he received is on noms Does it matter if it is not on the correct point As long as the volumes are ok How many volumes was the invoice and how many was he expecting Please let me know Thanks Gloria Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Tuesday November AM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject RE CIG Gloria I was looking at Path Manager and it doesnt look to me like they even pathed this CAN point Let me know what you find out Mark Bergeron at Woodward is expecting a call back from us Paul Lucci today Thanks Theresa The invoice they received must be based on nominations right Original Message From Barkowsky Gloria G Sent Tuesday November AM To Staab Theresa Subject CIG Theresa CIG just finaled their invoices today and I am working on them I will take a look at this and get back with you Thanks Gloria

CIG Cc Jackie Woodward is callingcontract has deliveries to Canon City dth per day and I see it on your spread sheet but it is not in path manager and not on the contract Can you please look into this asap The guy at Woodward is wanting a call back from Paul Lucci today Thanks Gloria

RE FW Public Service Company of ColoradoTheresa have you heard anything on this Please let me know Thanks Gloria Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Monday August PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject RE FW Public Service Company of Colorado Theyve already called Paul Lucci The problem is this deal was done by Nicole Cortez who is no longer with us back in June of last year to Western Natural GasAurora Which exact company we dont know Trouble is that Aurora no longer exists and Im not sure if Western Natural does either Credit was talking to Paul this morning and Ill have to track him down to see how their conversation ended Ill keep you posted Theresa Gloria G nronXgate PM To Theresa NRON cc Subject RE FW Public Service Company of Colorado Who does that Should we call them Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Monday August PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject RE FW Public Service Company of Colorado Im waiting for the deal to be released Theresa Gloria G nronXgate AM To Theresa NRON cc Subject RE FW Public Service Company of Colorado Has this been pathed Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Wednesday August PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject RE FW Public Service Company of Colorado Gloria The deal is I will path it once its validated Theresa Gloria G nronXgate PM To Theresa NRON cc Subject RE FW Public Service Company of Colorado Yes I need you to put in a deal for this transaction Our cumulative imbalance is off from PSCO by mmbtus Let me know when its out there Thanks Gloria Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Wednesday August PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject Re FW Public Service Company of Colorado Gloria I am faxing to you an Imbalance Trade Request form which I sent in to PSCO on June for a volume of We traded this imbalance with Western Natural Gas Aurora Nat Gas Nicole Cortez from our office who is no longer here would have input the deal I am trying to find any notes because I dont see a deal in the system The only inclination of a note I have is a price of which I think would be the NWPL index for June Let me know if you want me to put in a deal for this transaction Theresa Gloria G nronXgate PM To Theresa NRON cc Subject FW Public Service Company of Colorado Theresa did you ever find out anything about this Please let me know Thanks Gloria Original Message From Adams Jacqueline P Sent Tuesday August PM To Barkowsky Gloria G Subject RE Public Service Company of Colorado Gloria I questioned your email because you referred to the statement and then referred to the market list for I didnt know what year you were talking about I have the statement you left for me and I have no idea what this is all about We did not ship in June however I believe that Theresa in the Denver office did I will check with her and have her get back to you Please be aware that she is busy with COGA this week so it may be the end of the week or possibly next week Jackie Original Message From Barkowsky Gloria G Sent Monday August PM To Adams Jacqueline P Subject Public Service Company of Colorado Jackie can you please schedule this for production Please let me know Thanks Gloria On the statement Public Service is showing an imbalance swap delivery to Aurora Natural Gas For dth I do not see Aurora Natural Gas in the Market List for
